ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-14T03:18:57 [Issue ID 4000-553981] urn:comicvine:4000-553981 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-12 08:33:45. [Issue ID 1639545]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Into the Worldscape – Dynamite’s fantasy adventure crossover event kicks off as the Pathfinders are drawn into the mysterious Worldscape, where the greatest warriors of Hyboria, Barsoom, Golarion and Earth clash in an ancient battle of life and death! Magic, monsters, and mystery co-starring Red Sonja! The Worldscape beckons in a tale written by Pathfinder publisher Erik Mona (Pathfinder: Hollow Mountain) with art from Jonathan Lau (Red Sonja and Cub). Contains a Pathfinder RPG rules appendix and a bonus, EXCLUSIVE pull-out poster map!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Reilly Brown | 1 | B | Cover B | Ben Caldwell | 2 | C/Sub | Subscription Cover | Sean Izaakse | 3 | D/LE | Ultra-Limited Edition Variant Cover | Tom Mandrake | 4 | E/RE | Paizo.com Exclusive Variant Cover | Jonathan Ang Lau | 5 | *Notes:* Cover A is a homage to the cover of Justice League #1.The Subscription Cover is a homage of the covers of Baffling Mysteries #7 and Crisis on Infinite Earths #7.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-02-10 23:12:22. [CVDB553981]
